title: Online Science Education Course Development Using Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of scientific fields and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A science education program for working professionals, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment and operated with a focus on summative assessments. Suitable for institutional settings with experience collaborating with OPM (Online Program Management) providers.

learning_goals: Learners can design science education content by applying the five stages of design thinking (Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test)
Learners can explain methods for analyzing and incorporating stakeholder requirements in online education development processes
Learners can design and implement assessment tools suitable for blended learning environments

resources: Digital Educational Resources for Science Subjects

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
